mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId , USER_ADDRESS as userAddress , USER_PHONENUMBER as userPhoneNumber , USER_NAME as userName , USER_EMAIL as userEmail FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE as studyCode , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_NAME as studyName , STUDY_INFO.STUDY_TOPIC as studyTopic FROM STUDY_INFO WHERE STUDY_INFO.STUDY_RGSTUS_ID = #{userCode} AND STUDY_INFO.USE_YN = 'Y' AND STUDY_INFO.STUDY_CODE IN (SELECT STUDY_CODE FROM USER_IN_STUDY WHERE USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y' )
